title: Isolate the call to a function
content: Is it possible to call a function of a binary and obtain its result (without calling other functions), to isolate; are there any tools to do this?

comments.text: Is the binary a dynamically-linked ELF?
Then you can use LIEF as mentioned below

answers_data.content:
You can use Ida's Appcall functionality:

If it's an elf and you don't have Ida, LIEF is a good option. You can see a tutorial to export an internal function and call it here
